1983) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe n'oge a

A mụrụ Moffat Takadiwa na Tengwe, na mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Hurungwe ebe ọ tolitere. Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara n'obodo Harare, ebe a maara ya dị ka 'nwoke mkpofu ime mmụọ' n'ihi nrụnye ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ọ na-emepụta site na ihe mkpofu. Takadiwa bikwara na South Africa nwa oge. Ọ bụ ebe o mepụtara njikọ aka na mmekorita nke na-eme ka ọrụ nka ya marawanye. Ọ na-ekwu maka ọdịbendị ihe onwunwe, ọnọdụ ime mmụọ na gburugburu ebe obibi. N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ gbanwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke a gbahapụrụ n'afọ ndị na-adịgide adịgide ka ọ bụrụ ebe nka na-aga nke ọma na obodo Mbare
A na-akpọ oghere ahụ Mbare Art Space, ebe a ka o wuru ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, mana ọ na-akpọkwa ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ ka ha na ya rụọ ọrụ.
Takadiwa malitere igosi ọrụ ya n'ụzọ ọkachamara n'afọ 2008, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-amalite First Floor Gallery na Harare, nke bụzi ụlọ ngosi dị mkpa nke onwe ya
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ
Takadiwa, onye ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na obodo, na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a site na Mbare Art Space
N'ịbụ onye chọtara ndekọ pụrụ iche iji wuo ọrụ ya, Takadiwa, bụ ugbu a otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe nke oge a

A na-egosi ọrụ ya n'ebe dị iche iche site na Los Angeles ruo Johannesburg; Harare ruo Tokyo na ọtụtụ ebe dị n'etiti. Takadiwa bụ onye a zụkwara na Harare Polytechnic ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere BA Honors na Fine Art
Otu n'ime ihe ndị o dere dị ugbu a na nchịkọta Jay Z.
2018 - Framed in Colonial Lenses, Raw Spot Gallery, Mahadum Rhodes
2017 - Say Hello to English, Tyburn Gallery, London
2012 - Africa not reachable, First Floor Gallery, Harare
